amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the funding for renewable energy programs by $50 million; and reduce funding for the Energy Department's missile program by $60 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the account for Department of Energy--Energy Programs--Energy Supply by $50,000,000 and to reduce the account for Atomic Energy Defense Activities National Nuclear Security Administration--Weapons Activities by $60,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 258 (Roll no. 201).
